description: File, URL, domain, and IP analysis service — malware detection and threat intelligence
setup_steps: 3. Premium tier: Higher limits, hunting rules, retrohunt

security_notes: Free tier has strict rate limits — cache results where possible
Files submitted to VT are shared with the community (do not submit sensitive files)
Hash lookups are safe — they don't upload anything
URL scans may trigger the URL to be visited by VT scanners
